prompt: A grand and awe-inspiring starship from the Celestial Empires universe. The Eclipse Sovereign glides through a vibrant nebula, its sleek and intricate design illuminated by the surrounding stars and cosmic dust. The ship features ornate celestial symbols and radiant energy conduits, with a powerful aura emanating from its core. In the background, distant galaxies and swirling constellations add to the sense of vast, cosmic mystery. The mood is ethereal and majestic, capturing the grandeur of this legendary starship.
